channel.title: Npc attack player

item.title: Npc attack player
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Okay, i am creating auto-attack for NPCs, like when u run past them, they attack you.

Right now, i have the following:

    		server.npcHandler.npcs[i].StartKilling = c.playerId;
    		server.npcHandler.npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
    		server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[i].TurnNPCTo(c.absX, c.absY);

This is a Devo base and i dunno why it wont work, maybe the following is wrong:

    		server.npcHandler.npcs[i].StartKilling = c.playerId;

I’m thinking the " playerId " is wrong…can anybody tell me if it is or not?

Read full topic
